translation: And I am the all-devouring Death, and the source of prosperity for those who are to be prosperous; among the feminine qualities, I am fame, prosperity, speech, memory, intelligence, firmness, and forgiveness.
commentary: 10.34 Death death? Alldevouring? f and? I'm I? The origin of the prosperity? f and? future of those who are to be prosperous? Fame: frame? Sri: prosperity? Speech speech? f and? of women of the feminine? Memory: the memory? Medha intelligence? Patience: firmness? forgiveness forgiveness.Commentary I am also the allsnatching death that destroys everything. Death is of two kinds? viz.? he who seizes wealth
